text: was it icey last night in portland? I woke up to my windows frozen shut this morning.
It wasn't so bad last night. Will probably get much worse tonight.
Yeah it was fairly dry in the evening. No real problems this morning either. Except for frozen toes.
I was too afraid of ice on the eastbank esplanade and took the streetcar this morning.
I didn't see any ice on the esplenade between Steel bridge and here, not even on the steel-grid bridge over the river. I hope it doesn't rain so that it stays ice-free
It's supposed to be pretty bright and sunny the next couple days so I imagine it'll be pretty safe.
